title: Help, cant access the (compromised) email attached to my account to change it
body: my old email is compromised, the hackers set the alternative emails to one of theirs so i cant get back into that email through resets. so now my league account also cant change as i basically said, if i cant use it no one can and triggered it to be locked down. so now when i try to change my password in the league account settings it sends a confirmation code to the locked email (0 chance i can get that back). can a rioter or mod help me out here?

replies.body:
Hi Vegathron

Your best bet will be to [contact player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) and they can help you get your account back.  They will ask you a bunch of questions that should help you prove that it is yours :)

Cheers
Mindstar
awesome all fixed now thanks heaps! feel alot safer!
